channel.title: CVE Feed for Advanced File Manager -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Advanced File Manager -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-7061|2024-07-10T02:02:41.083Z -- advanced%20file%20manager -- advanced%20file%20manager%20shortcodes
item.description: The Advanced File Manager Shortcodes plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads in all versions up to, and including, 2.5.3. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor access or above to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.

item.title: CVE-2023-7062|2024-07-10T02:02:46.771Z -- advanced%20file%20manager -- advanced%20file%20manager%20shortcodes
item.description: The Advanced File Manager Shortcodes plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Directory Traversal in all versions up to, and including, 2.4. This makes it possible for attackers with contributor access or higher to read the contents of arbitrary files on the server, which can contain sensitive information.
